评论概述: Perfect watch other than humidity in ensemble
评论详情: The metal band never crossed or wore away. Usually even nice watches irritate my skin or turn it green. Never had an issue with the metal corroding.  The watch was assembled with some humidity inside so when I took a hot shower the inside of the glass fogged up and took many months to dissipate. The battery wore out after about a year. The dials do work for a stop watch type of function.

I was looking at Citizen, Seiko, other expensive watches and not one of those had the perfect combination that caused me to pull the trigger. I loved the color blue of this watch with the gold and silver highlights, so I thought I would see if I liked a non-digital watch and to see what features I would use and what features are nice to have. I have been using Apple Watches but wanted to compare an analog watch so I thought I would give it a try. So far I have been happy with the watch, the bracelet adjusting tool is useless (the plastic screw stripped when I tried to take out the first link) but I brought it into a watch repair store and had the links removed for $15. Overall decent quality, looks, appearance and a solid value for the price. We'll see how long it holds up, how it wears over time and if it lasts.  Definitely worth the $ at this point (I have had it a month).

评论概述: Not a bad watch for the price, nice blues used on the dials, small things are a little off though
评论详情: The Olevs watches are not bad watches. The construction seems generally good and they pay "homage" to the designs of more expensive watch companies, even the two-tone bracelet it okay, and looks close to its model. The bezel rotates with a satisfying click but there is a little slop in the precision. You can get the 12:00 index arrow on the bezel to line up with the 12 hour maker if you are careful. Opening the watch reveals an quartz Chinese movement with a slightly uncommon watch battery. I find on my model, the seconds subdial (center, bottom) does not line up to zero when reset. Lines up somewhere between 59 seconds and 0. So not the most accurate chronograph to read, I'd say. The minutes subdial does line up. I guess this is a good beater watch, something to wear everyday and can get banged up without worry and that happens to look like a more expensive watch. Didn't like some of the small issues but I wouldn't hesitate to give this as a gift.

评论概述: Great and attractive watch at a great price!
评论详情: This is my 4th Olevs watch, and it doesn't disappoint. Very solid and well designed! Think Rolex without the astronomical cost. The blue contrasting with gold and silver is very elegant looking. It has a date window and chronograph, as well as a great locking clasp with logo. Beautiful watch, very pleased!
